name: Nekroz
author: LouieBenitezII
notes: After getting to my KoG promotion game and dropping down to Legend 1 twice with Dark Magician, I was able to hit KoG with Bamboo CA. Hit a 15 game win streak after making some adjustments to the lists posted on the CA chat. Thanks to everyone who posted info on the deck. (Posting my shitty F2P Dark Magician deck for those masochists trying to climb the ladder)
